title: Sonia Gandhi’s Poster On Shiv Sena Bhavan? No, It’s Photoshopped
subtitle: Fact Check | An image of Shiv Sena Bhavan featuring INC President Sonia has been shared been doing rounds on the internet.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Amidst the government formation in Maharashtra, an image of Shiv Sena Bhavan featuring the photograph of interim Congress President Sonia Gandhi has been circulated on Facebook.

The caption with the picture reads, “बस !!! अब यही देखना बाकी रह गया था (Translated: Just!!! This was the only thing left to see).”

Shiv Sena, NCP and the Congress formed the government on 28 November with Uddhav Thackeray swearing in as the Chief Minister of Maharashtra.
